tipEn: Gimbal data sending error. Smart Track paused. Reinstall payload
tipCn: 云台数据发送异常，智能跟踪功能停止，请重新拔插负载

tipEn: Gimbal data sending error. Smart Track paused. Reinstall payload
tipCn: 云台数据发送异常，智能跟踪功能停止，请重新拔插负载

tipEn: Remote controller data sending error. Target Acquisition stopped. Restart RC
tipCn: 遥控器数据发送异常，目标锁定功能停止，请重启遥控器

tipEn: Remote controller data sending error. Target Acquisition paused. Check connection between RC and aircraft
tipCn: 遥控器数据发送异常，目标锁定功能停止，请检查遥控器与飞行器的连接状况

tipEn: Obstacle detected. RTH stopped. Manually control aircraft to avoid obstacle
tipCn: 遇到障碍物，自动返航停止，请手动控制飞机远离障碍

tipEn: GEO Zone nearby. RTH stopped. Manually control aircraft to avoid GEO Zone
tipCn: 遇到限飞区，自动返航停止，请手动控制飞机远离限飞区
自动返航异常，请切换至手动飞行

tipEn: Remote controller disconnected. Failsafe RTH in progress
tipCn: 遥控器失联，已启动失控返航

tipEn: Enabling RTH Obstacle Check failed. Control aircraft to return to home manually
tipCn: 自动返航避障功能启动失败，请切换至手动返航

tipEn: GPS signal weak. RTH accuracy affected. Manual RTH recommended
tipCn: GPS信号弱，自动返航精度低，建议切换至手动返航

tipEn: RTH Obstacle Check error. Control aircraft to return to home manually
tipCn: 自动返航避障功能异常，请切换至手动返航

tipEn: Focused shooting unavailable with current payload
tipCn: 当前负载不支持精准拍照

tipEn: Focused shooting failed . Switched to normal shooting mode
tipCn: 精准拍照失败，执行普通拍照

tipEn: AI Spot-Check failed. Switched to normal shooting mode
tipCn: 精准复拍失败，执行普通拍照

tipEn: Camera not mounted. Focused shooting failed
tipCn: 未挂载相机，精准拍照失败

tipEn: Camera error. Focused shooting failed. Restart camera
tipCn: 相机异常，精准拍照失败，请重启相机

tipEn: Switching shooting modes failed. AI Spot-Check failed. Restart camera
tipCn: 相机切换拍照模式失败，精准复拍失败，请重启相机

tipEn: Camera zoom timed out. AI Spot-Check failed. Restart camera
tipCn: 相机变焦超时，精准复拍失败，请重启相机

tipEn: Unable to locate focused shooting sample. Reupload flight route
tipCn: 精准拍照示意图未找到，请重新上传航线

tipEn: Target box parameter error. Readjust target box
tipCn: 目标框参数错误，请调整目标框

tipEn: Gimbal error. Focused shooting failed. Reinstall payload
tipCn: 云台异常，精准拍照失败，请重新拔插负载

tipCn: 目标发生异常移动，请重新确认目标

tipEn: GPS signal weak and vision positioning unavailable. Aircraft switched to A mode. Control aircraft manually
tipCn: GPS信号弱且视觉定位失效，飞行器切换至姿态模式，请手动控制飞行器

tipEn: During Smart Track, you can control gimbals within a certain limit
tipCn: 智能跟踪时只能在一定范围内控制云台

tipEn: During Smart Track, you can control lens zoom within a certain limit
tipCn: 智能跟踪时只能在一定范围内控制变焦

tipEn: Obstacle avoidance or backlight detected. Press the Pause button on the remote controller to exit RTH and manually control aircraft to return to home
tipCn: 遇到障碍物或环境逆光，请按遥控器上暂停键退出自动返航，进行手动返航

tipEn: Control stick pushed down. Aircraft descending. Aircraft RTH canceled
tipCn: 检测到打杆下降，已退出自动返航

tipEn: Control stick pushed down. Aircraft flying backward. Aircraft RTH canceled
tipCn: 检测到打杆后退，已退出自动返航
